successTicket: Your ticket sent successfully. support team will contact you soon.
payment4WelcomesUsers: Payment4 welcomes users to a secure cryptocurrency payment gateway, simplifying transactions with integrated blockchains like Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain.
cardOneDesc: Empower your project with Payment4's tailored cryptocurrency payment gateway.
cardTwoDesc: Place your logo on payment page and customize its appearance.
cardThreeDesc: Create an invoice, share the link and get paid- it’s an easy payment solution for your online business of any kind.
cardFourDesc: Earn commissions, enjoy seamless withdrawals with Payment4's Affiliation, fostering community engagement through unique referral codes.
progressOneDesc: The initial step for merchants to join the Payment4 platform. To get started, merchants need to sign up for an account. Merchants can sign up by entering their email and password or using the quick option of Google Sign-In.
progressTwoDesc: After signing up, merchants proceed to set up their cryptocurrency gateway. This involves configuring their preferences, linking their online store, and choosing supported blockchain networks.
progressThreeDesc: Merchants have the option to create 'paylinks' for easy payment processing without the need for an API. Payment4 API enables merchants to integrate cryptocurrency payments and blockchain transactions programmatically into websites or apps.
progressFourDesc: Merchants initiate settlement requests, specifying the network and token for each transaction. This involves the system handling the entire settlement process, from identifying related accounts to transferring balances and covering fees.
progressFiveDesc: Implement robust encryption to secure user private keys, restricting access. Enhance account security with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Setup, allowing merchants to add an extra layer of protection to their Payment4 accounts.
crafting: Crafting Payments for Every Business Case
sliderThreeDesc: 24-hour availability for uninterrupted guidance and seamless transaction experience.
sliderOneDesc: Expand worldwide, ensuring success in diverse markets without spatial restrictions.
sliderTwoDesc: Fast checkout, available around the clock for seamless global transactions.
sliderFourDesc: Support for various cryptocurrencies, unlocking endless business possibilities
adDesc: Ready to experience seamless cryptocurrency transactions? Join Payment4 today and revolutionize your online payments.
footerDesc: With a focus on innovation, security, and user experience, we aim to provide you with the best tools for cryptocurrency payments and transactions.
docIntro: The Payment4 Payment Gateway is a web-based service designed to facilitate cryptocurrency payments and blockchain transactions for businesses and individuals. It empowers you to integrate blockchain transactions and cryptocurrency payments into your online store and digital services, utilizing the capabilities of Payment4.
transactionTxtOne: Every transaction follows a defined path from initiation to settlement. The status of each transaction is meticulously recorded at every stage, allowing for real-time tracking through the merchant system. A unique token is assigned to each transaction, granting access to its details. Transaction status is separately displayed in the table below, and in Payment4's data models, it is represented as the 'status.'
transactionTxtTwo: Testing and Sandbox Environment : Before going live with real transactions, we encourage you to test your Transactions in a sandbox environment. This allows you to simulate transactions and ensure that everything works as expected. You can access our sandbox environment by instructions on how to access the sandbox environment.
settlements: Merchants have the flexibility to choose which cryptocurrencies they accept, including popular options like BTC and ETH. For each cryptocurrency, they must provide an address to receive the funds. Notably, Payment4 does not hold funds from the merchant's customers. After each payment, the full amount, minus the transaction fee, is promptly transferred to the merchant's predetermined receiving address.
systemLimitOne: Global Minimum Transaction Amount Limit: Payment4 enforces a global minimum transaction amount of $5, irrespective of the chosen cryptocurrency (BTC, ETH, etc.). Transactions with amounts less than $5 will be rejected.
systemLimitTwo: Rate Limits and Usage Policies: Payment4 may have rate limits on API usage to ensure fair and efficient utilization of our services. Please refer to our API documentation for detailed rate limit information and usage policies.
apiKey: To utilize the Payment4 web gateway and API services, merchants are required to create an API key. This key serves as the bridge between their systems and Payment4's services.
security: Payment4 prioritizes the security of your transactions and customer data. We employ robust security measures to safeguard your business and your customers. All communication with Payment4 is encrypted using industry-standard protocols to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your data. Authentication is a critical aspect of our system. Merchants are required to use an API key when making requests to our API. This key serves as a secure identifier to authenticate your requests, preventing unauthorized access. For additional security, we also offer optional two-factor authentication (2FA) to add an extra layer of protection to your account. We strongly encourage merchants to enable 2FA for enhanced security.
apiDoc: Merchants can use the API to initiate transactions by specifying the 'coin,' 'fiat amount,' and other relevant details. Payment4 generates a wallet address for the transaction, calculates the required cryptocurrency amount for the payment, and sends this information back to the merchant. Merchants must then display the generated address and amount to their customers, monitoring the transaction status with Payment4. When customers pay the specified amount to the address, Payment4 responds with a 'success' status. In this API-based method, merchants are responsible for implementing the payment procedures on their websites or apps, while Payment4 handles the blockchain-related processes.
titleCreatePayment: When sending transaction details to Payment4, merchants should structure their request as follows:
apiHeaderCreatePayment: Merchants must also include their API key in the request header:
requestSentToCreatePayment: The request should be sent using the 'POST' method to the following address:
sandboxCreatePayment: sandbox : This boolean parameter indicates whether the transaction should be treated as a sandbox/test transaction (true) or a live/real transaction (false). Setting it to 'false' means that the transaction is a live one, and actual funds may be involved.
amountCreatePayment: amount : This field specifies the transaction amount, which is the monetary value of the payment. In this example, the amount is set to 5, which means the transaction involves a payment of $5.Any amount property that is below the minimum equivalent in dollars will be rejected.
callbackUrlCreatePayment: callbackUrl: This URL serves as the redirect destination for the payment page after a successful payment. It's important to note that it will be a GET request if you want to call an endpoint from the backend.
callbackParamsCreatePayment: callbackParams : This is an object that allows merchants to include additional parameters or data to be sent along with the callback to their system. In the provided example, it includes a key-value pair, 'your_key' with the value 'your value.' Merchants can customize this as needed to include relevant data for their internal processing.
webhookUrlCreatePayment: webhookUrl : Similar to the callback URL, this is the URL where Payment4 will send webhook notifications, which can be used for more real-time updates or automation. In the example, 'https://your-domain/payment/webhook/' is a placeholder, and merchants should replace it with their actual webhook URL.
webhookParamsCreatePayment: webhookParams : Just like the callbackParams, this object allows merchants to send additional parameters along with the webhook notification. In the example, it includes a key-value pair 'your_key' with the value 'your value.' Merchants can tailor these parameters to their specific needs.The webhook operates exclusively with 'GET' requests.
languageCreatePayment: language : This field specifies the language in which Payment4 should provide responses. In this case, 'en' represents English. Payment4 supports multiple languages, including: 'en' for English, 'fr' for French, 'es' for Spanish, 'ar' for Arabic, 'tr' for Turkish, and 'fa' for Persian. The default value of the language is 'en'.
currencyCreatePayment: currency : The 'currency' field specifies the currency in which the transaction amount is expressed. It defines the monetary unit used for the payment, such as US Dollars (USD), Euros (EUR), Turkish Lira (TRY), British Pounds (GBP), United Arab Emirates Dirhams (AED), or Iranian Rials (IRT). The selected currency determines the financial denomination of the transaction.default value of currency is 'USD'
errorsDescriptionCreatePayment: In case of errors, Payment4 provides informative error messages, including:
titleVerifyPayment: Verifying transactions in Payment4 is crucial to ensure accuracy and security. Merchants can initiate this process by sending the following data in the request body:
requestDataVerifyPayment: The API key must be included in the request header:
apiHeaderVerifyPayment: Merchants should send their request by 'PUT' method to the address below:
errorsDescriptionVerifyPayment: In cases of verification errors, Payment4 provides detailed error messages, including:
amountDifferenceDescVerifyPayment: You only receive 'amountDifference' when the payment status is 'ACCEPTABLE' or 'MISMATCH'.
sdkDoc: These SDKs provide a set of tools and libraries to facilitate the integration of Payment4's crypto gateway into various applications and platforms. Whether you're developing a website, mobile app, or a backend system, These SDKs aim to simplify the process of accepting and managing cryptocurrency transactions.
sdkNodeDesc: This SDK allows merchants to seamlessly integrate Payment4's crypto gateway into their systems, enabling secure and efficient cryptocurrency transactions.
nodeSdkStart: To get started with the Crypto Gateway Node SDK, follow these simple installation steps:
nodeSdkConfiguration: Configure the SDK with your merchant-specific settings by following these steps:
addApiKey: Add your APIKEY in Payment4 config.
addApiKeyDesc: You can add your APIKEY to .env file, please look at to following example :
usingCallbackUrl: If you use callbackUrl as a static URL you can set it here, otherwise, leave it blank.
usingWebhookUrl: If you use webhookUrl as a static URL you can set it here, otherwise, leave it blank.
pluginDesc: The plugins were created to address a challenge that we and several merchants were facing, which was a gateway that prioritizes customer privacy, has no external redirects, allows seamless integration, incurs no middleman fees, and we achieved it.
dlPlugin: Download and Install Payment4 Plugin. Begin by downloading the Payment4 plugin from
headOfWordPress: Head to your WordPress admin dashboard. Navigate to 'Plugins' and click on 'Add New.' Activate the plugin.
configurePlugin: Configure Plugin Settings. In the WordPress dashboard, go to  locate 'Payment4' among the available payment options and click on it.
fillInPluginSettings: Fill in Plugin Settings. Locate the plugin setting form containing the following fields. Complete the required details as outlined below:
enableDisable: Enable/Disable: Toggle to enable or disable the plugin.
pluginSandbox: Sandbox: When enabled, the payment process will generate developer mode links. Recommend this only for testing purposes and not in a production environment.
apiKeyPlugin: API Key: Enter the API key received from the merchant panel of Payment4. To obtain an API key, you must first sign up.
successPaymentMessage: Success Payment Message: Define the success payment message that will be displayed on your website.
failedPaymentMessage: Failed Payment Message: Specify the message displayed on your website in case of a failed payment.
acceptablePaymentMessage: Acceptable Payment Message: Set the message displayed for successful payments on your website.
mismatchPaymentMessage: Mismatch Payment Message: Determine the message displayed in case of a mismatched payment on your website.
optimizeWooCommerceCheckoutPage: Optimize WooCommerce Checkout Page. To ensure compatibility, go to the WooCommerce settings. Under the 'Checkout' tab, find the option to switch the checkout page style to classic.
seamlesslyUse: Seamlessly Use Payment4. With the plugin configured and settings saved, Payment4 becomes an available payment gateway during the checkout process. Customers can now enjoy a smooth and secure payment experience on your WooCommerce store.
dlPluginDesc: Download, install, and enhance your WooCommerce store with Payment4. Need the plugin?
pluginBenefits: Fill in the simple form, optimize your checkout page, and offer a streamlined payment experience to your customers!
whmcsPluginDesc: This plugin is a powerful integration that extends the capabilities of WHMCS to seamlessly handle cryptocurrency transactions, providing a secure and efficient payment gateway for your web hosting and services.
openCartPluginDesc: Open Cart store builder is another one of the best online store building systems, with the help of which you can create a store site. Open Card is a plugin with simple and easy management, powerful SEO and high speed in processing information on your site.
developerDesc: For in-depth information about the Payment4 API, including endpoint details, request/response formats, error codes, and comprehensive examples, please refer to our Developer URL. This document provides technical guidance for integrating with Payment4 and can be found at Developers item in the menu.
docContactUs: We understand that questions and issues may arise while using our service. Our dedicated support team is here to assist you promptly. For any inquiries, assistance, or support requests, please contact us:
committedTeam: Our team is committed to providing exceptional support to ensure a smooth experience for our merchants.
secureAndReliableDesc: Payment4 ensures secure transactions and protects user funds with robust encryption and reliable storage of private keys.
seamlessIntegrationDesc: Payment4's user friendly APIs and customizable solutions expand payment options seamlessly for merchants.
fastAndCostEffectiveDesc: Payment4 optimizes fees, ensuring fast settlements for merchants with minimal fees access.
innovativeFeaturesDesc: Payment4 enhances crypto payments with custom paylinks, a referral program, and innovative tools.
aboutUsDesc: At Payment4, we're redefining the way the world pays. As a leading cryptocurrency payment gateway service, we empower businesses and individuals to seamlessly integrate cryptocurrency payments into their transactions, providing a secure, efficient, and borderless payment solution.
ourMissionDesc: Our mission is clear: to make cryptocurrency payments accessible and straightforward for everyone. We believe in the potential of blockchain technology to revolutionize the financial landscape, and we're on a mission to ensure that no one is left behind.
JoinTheBusinesses: Join the hundreds of businesses already using Payment4. It's free to sign up
name: Name

privacyPolicy.welcomeToPayment4Crypto: Welcome to Payment4 Crypto Payment Gateway!
privacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDesc: At Payment4, we understand the importance of safeguarding your personal information and are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect the information you provide when using our cryptocurrency payment gateway services. We believe in transparency and want you to feel confident that your data is in safe hands. This policy explains the types of information we collect, why we collect it, and how you can exercise control over your data. Please take the time to read through this policy to understand our practices and how they align with your rights as a user. By accessing or using our cryptocurrency payment gateway services, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about this policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@payment4.com. Your privacy matters to us, and we are here to provide you with the information you need. Thank you for choosing Payment4.com. Your trust is invaluable to us, and we are dedicated to providing you with a secure and reliable payment gateway experience.
privacyPolicy.weCollectVariousTypesOfInformation: We collect various types of information when you use our cryptocurrency payment gateway services. The information we gather falls into the following categories:
privacyPolicy.personalInformationDesc: This includes details such as your website’s name, email address, contact information, and cryptocurrency wallet addresses. We collect this information when you register for an account or use our services.
privacyPolicy.paymentDetailsDesc: When processing transactions, we may collect payment information such as cryptocurrency wallet addresses, and other financial details such as coins, amounts and transaction hashes. Please note that we do not have any kind of access to user’s cryptocurrency wallets and we just transfer funds between buyers and merchants.
privacyPolicy.UsageDataDesc: We gather information about your interactions with our website and services. This includes IP addresses, device information, browser type, pages visited, and actions taken. We use this data to analyze user behavior and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.cookiesAndTrackingTechnologiesDesc: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and provide personalized content. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us understand your preferences and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.weUseTheInformation: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
privacyPolicy.providingCustomerSupportAndRespondingToI: Providing customer support and responding to inquiries.
privacyPolicy.sendingImportantNotifications: Sending important notifications and updates about our services.
privacyPolicy.improvingOurWebsite: Improving our website's functionality, user experience, and security.
privacyPolicy.analyzingUsagePatterns: Analyzing usage patterns and trends to enhance our services.
privacyPolicy.complyingWithLegal: Complying with legal and regulatory requirements.
privacyPolicy.weMayShareYourInformation: We may share your information with third parties under the following circumstances:
privacyPolicy.requiredByLawLi2: When required by law, regulation, or legal process.
privacyPolicy.protectRightsLi3: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, as well as those of our users or the public.
privacyPolicy.mergerOrAcquisitionLi4: In connection with the sale, merger, or acquisition of all or a portion of our company.
privacyPolicy.weDoNotSellOrRent: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
privacyPolicy.securityParagraph: We are committed to maintaining the security of your information and have implemented various technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Despite our efforts, no online platform can be entirely secure, and we urge you to take appropriate precautions when sharing information online.
privacyPolicy.weProcessYourPersonalInformation: We process your personal information based on different legal grounds, including:
privacyPolicy.processingBasis1: In many cases, the processing of your data is necessary to fulfill our contractual obligations when you use our services. This includes processing transactions, facilitating payments, and providing customer support.
privacyPolicy.processingBasis2: We may ask for your explicit consent to process certain types of personal information. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. If you do withdraw consent, it will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.
privacyPolicy.processingBasis3: We may process your data when it is in our legitimate interests to do so and when these interests are not overridden by your data protection rights. For example, we may use your information to improve our services, conduct analytics, and enhance user experience.
privacyPolicy.processingBasis4: We may process your personal information to comply with legal obligations, regulatory requirements, or court orders.
privacyPolicy.processingBasis5: In certain circumstances, we may process your data to protect your vital interests or those of another individual.
privacyPolicy.youHaveTheRightToObjectToCertainProcessi: Please note that you have the right to object to certain processing activities based on legitimate interests. To exercise this right, please contact us at support@payment4.com.
privacyPolicy.AsAUserOfOur: As a user of our payment4 service, you have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacyPolicy.dataRetention1: We will retain your account information as long as your account is active. If you request account closure, we will retain your data for a reasonable period afterward for administrative, legal, or security purposes.
privacyPolicy.dataRetention2: Transaction data, including payment details, will be retained for a period necessary to complete transactions, address disputes, and meet legal and regulatory requirements.
privacyPolicy.dataRetention3: Usage data, such as IP addresses and device information, may be retained for a period necessary to analyze website performance, improve services, and comply with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.dataRetention4: If you have provided consent for marketing communications, we will retain your contact information until you withdraw your consent or opt-out from receiving such communications.
privacyPolicy.dataRetention5: Personal information may be retained for longer periods as required by applicable laws and regulations.
privacyPolicy.onceTheRetentionPeriodExpires: Once the retention period expires, your personal information will be securely deleted or anonymized, unless further processing is required to fulfill legal obligations or legitimate business interests.
privacyPolicy.ifYouHaveAnyQuestions: If you have any questions regarding our data retention practices, please contact us at support@payment4.com.
privacyPolicy.weMayUpdateThisPrivacyPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or the nature of our services. When we make changes to this policy, we will revise the 'Last Updated' date at the top of the policy.
privacyPolicy.weEncourageYouToReview: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. By continuing to use our services after any changes to this Privacy Policy, you agree to the revised terms.
privacyPolicy.ifThereAreSignificantChanges: If there are significant changes to this Privacy Policy that affect the way we collect, use, or share your personal information, we will notify you by posting a prominent notice on our website or by other means of communication.
privacyPolicy.concernsRelatedToThisPrivacyPolicy: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us using the following email:
privacyPolicy.weAreCommittedToAddressingYourInquiries: We are committed to addressing your inquiries and resolving any concerns you may have regarding the privacy and security of your personal information.
privacyPolicy.ourDataProcessingActivities: Our data processing activities are conducted in accordance with applicable data protection laws and regulations. This Privacy Policy aims to provide you with clear and transparent information about how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. As a data controller, we take our responsibilities seriously and strive to ensure that your rights and interests are respected. If you have concerns about our data processing practices, please contact us using the information provided in the 'Contact Information' section of this Privacy Policy.

notFoundDesc: We are sorry, the page you requested could not be found. Please go back to the home page!

descriptionColumn.1001: This error occurs when there are validation issues with the request.
descriptionColumn.1002: This error indicates that the API key was not included in the request.
descriptionColumn.1003: This error occurs when the provided API key is not found or recognized by the system.
descriptionColumn.1004: This error signifies that the selected gateway is not approved or authorized for the transaction.
descriptionColumn.1012: This error indicates that the provided currency is invalid or not supported.

descriptionColumn.1005: This error is triggered when the requested assets are not found.
descriptionColumn.1011: This error occurs when the payment amount is below the specified minimum limit.
descriptionColumn.1013: This error occurs when the specified language is invalid or not supported.

descriptionColumn.1006: This error is raised when the specified payment could not be found in the system. Ensure that you are providing the correct payment information.
descriptionColumn.1010: This error is raised when the payment amount provided in the request is invalid or not within the accepted range. Ensure that the amount is within the specified limits.

vendorPage.pageDescription: In Payment4, various opportunities for earning money are available. This platform allows users to operate as acceptors, vendors, or referrers. Through these roles, users can collaborate with others and generate income. Vendors, in particular, benefit from managing payment gateways and earning commissions.

invite.title: Inviting Sub-Members
invite.description: Users who register as acceptors on Payment4 can share their referral link and code to add sub-members and earn income from their activities.

businessPartner.title: Business partner
businessPartner.description: Vendors collaborate with companies and earn fees by installing cryptocurrency payment gateways on sub-members’ websites.

productPromotion.title: Product Promotion
productPromotion.description: Users can earn commissions by promoting products on websites that use the Payment4 gateway, profiting from sales.

businessPartner.title: Business Partner
businessPartner.intro: In the vendor section of Payment4, users act as independent vendors and benefit from various features to expand their business. Here, we provide more details on how the system works and the opportunities available for vendors on Payment4:

accessVendorPanel.title: Access to the Vendor Panel
accessVendorPanel.description: After registering on Payment4, vendors gain access to a special panel through which they can manage their activities. This panel offers features such as creating payment gateways, monitoring transactions, and overseeing financial performance.

creatingPaymentGateway.title: Creating a Payment Gateway
creatingPaymentGateway.description: Vendors can create separate payment gateways for each company or brand. With the access key to the gateway they create, they can implement it on their user’s website. This feature helps them create and track transactions independently for each specific company or section. It’s important to note that vendors only earn fees from transactions made through the gateways they created. If an acceptor creates a new gateway and processes transactions, the vendor will not receive a commission.

collaboratingOtherBrands.title: Collaborating with Other Brands
collaboratingOtherBrands.description: Vendors can collaborate with other companies or brands and implement their cryptocurrency payment gateway on their websites. This collaboration expands the sales network and increases access to new customers.

commissionTransactions.title: Commission Based on Transactions
commissionTransactions.description: For every transaction made through the vendors’ payment gateways, a commission amount is credited to their account. This commission is usually a percentage of the total transaction and serves as a reward for attracting and retaining customers. It should be noted that the vendor’s commission includes all transactions with a successful, acceptable, or non-compliant status.

benefitsCollaboration.title: Benefits of Collaboration
benefitsCollaboration.description: By utilizing Payment4’s features, vendors can interact more broadly with customers, enhance their advertising and marketing programs, and ultimately increase their profitability. These features, in addition to improving cash flow, significantly contribute to brand strengthening and enhancing business reputation. These opportunities allow all users to benefit from the financial advantages of Payment4 alongside their commercial activities.

warning.note: Please note that after deleting a specific gateway, all related transactions, tickets, and notifications will be removed!

cooperationForm.title: Ready to become a Business Partner?
cooperationForm.description: Complete your information to be contacted

openCart.title: Open Cart
openCart.description: OpenCart is a leading store builder with easy management, powerful SEO, and fast processing to create and manage your e-commerce site.

woocommerce.title: Woocommerce
woocommerce.description: Seamlessly integrate crypto payments into your WooCommerce store. Start accepting Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies with our easy-to-install plugin.

whmcs.title: WHMCS
whmcs.description: This plugin is a powerful integration that extends the capabilities of WHMCS to seamlessly handle cryptocurrency transactions, providing a secure and efficient payment gateway for your web hosting and services.

pluginHeader.title: Enable Crypto Payments on Your Website
pluginHeader.description: Looking to offer more payment options and grow your customer base? With Payment4's CMS plugins, you can seamlessly accept Bitcoin and other leading cryptocurrencies on your website, making transactions easier and more secure.

cryptoAdvantages.heading: Advantages of using a cryptocurrency payment gateway
cryptoAdvantages.title: Seamless and fast Integration process

advantages.title: Seamless and fast Integration process
advantages.description: Our plugins are built for quick installation and simple setup, allowing you to start accepting crypto payments instantly.

advantages.title: Effortlessly handle international transactions
advantages.description: Expand your business globally by enabling seamless and hassle-free cross-border transactions, reaching customers worldwide.

advantages.title: Support for over 50 cryptocurrencies
advantages.description: We offer support for a broad selection of leading cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and many others.

advantages.title: Expand your business with global payments
advantages.description: Expand your business globally by offering smooth, hassle-free cross-border payments, reaching customers around the world.

joinUsSection.title: Join Us and Start Accepting Crypto Payments
joinUsSection.description: Sign up now to become part of Payment4 and easily integrate cryptocurrency payments into your website.
